channel.title: Retention of NWW points and Storehouse Limits
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Retention of NWW points and Storehouse Limits"

item.title: Re: Retention of NWW points and Storehouse Limits
item.content:encoded: i tried it it resetsâ€¦ but people who do that are a**holes

item.title: Re: Retention of NWW points and Storehouse Limits
item.content:encoded: You keep your NWW points. I am inclined to believe that the items taken resets with each village but i am not sure. Keep in mind that the only way you can go to a another village in the same day and take items from that village is with wandering genin. The use of a televillage potions locks you out of the storehouse for one day. So the only one that can see if the items taken resets from village to village is a season 1 genin.

item.title: Retention of NWW points and Storehouse Limits
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I was just interested in knowing a little trivial info.
When you leave a village, do you retain your NWW points? Do they stay with you when you join a new village?
Also, if you withdraw items from your village's storehouse, quit, and then join a new village, will the number of items taken from the storehouse remain the same?

Thanks for the info.
